椓字的基本解释

椓
zhuó
敲：“约之阁阁，椓之橐橐。”
古代的宫刑。
太监，宦官。
说坏话诽谤：“卫侯辞以难，大子又使椓之。”

椓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuó］
［《廣韻》竹角切，入覺，知。］
(1)敲打，槌击。
(2)毁坏；伤害。
(3)攻讦，告发。
(4)宫刑。
(5)阉人。

椓字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　椓； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页537第02
【唐韻】【韻會】【正韻】?竹角切，音斲。【說文】擊也。【詩·周南】椓之丁丁。【左傳·哀十六年】衞侯辭以難，大子又使椓之。【註】謂攻擊之也。　又留土曰椓。【詩·小雅】椓之橐橐。　又去隂之?，本作?。【書·呂?】劓刵椓黥。【伏生傳】男女不以義交者，其?宮是也，故奄人亦謂之椓。【詩·大雅】昬椓靡共。　又叶都木切，音篤。【詩·小雅】民今之無祿，天夭是椓。

考證：〔【左傳·哀十一年】衞侯辭以難，公子又使椓之。〕　謹照原文十一年改十六年，公子改大子。〔【書·呂?】劓刖椓黥。〕　謹照原文刖改刵。〔【詩·大雅】民今之無祿，夭夭是椓。〕　謹照原文大雅改小雅，夭夭改天夭。

beat
zhuó
Knock: "The Pavilion of the Agreement, the 椓橐橐."
Ancient palace punishment.
Eunuch, eunuch.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuó］
["Guangyun" bamboo corner cuts, enters consciousness, knows. ]
(1) Beat or hammer.
(2) Destroy; hurt.
(3) Attack and report.
(4) Palace punishment.
(5) Eunuchs.

[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　椓; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 537 02
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Bamboo horns are cut, with sound. [Said the text] Hit also. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】Ding Ding of Bing. [Zuo Zhuan·Ai Sixteen Years] Wei Hou was struggling to make a speech, and the eldest made him beat him. [Note] It is also called attack.　I left the soil again and said 椓. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】The 椓橐橐.　Go to Yinzhi? This is? 【Book·Lu?】劓刵椓黥. [Fusheng Biography] Men and women who do not have righteous intercourse, their palace is also, so the dying person is also called the elder. 【Poetry·Daya】Congruent together.　Ye Du Mu cut, sound duke. [Poetry·Xiaoya] The people are innocent in the present, but Tianyao is the blessing. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Ai 11 years] Wei Hou was too difficult to resign, and the son made him beat him again. 〕 　 I would like to change from 11 years to 16 years according to the original text, and the son to the eldest son. 〔【Book·Lu?】劓刖椓黥. 〕　I would like to change it according to the original text. 〔【Poetry·Daya】The people have no wealth in the present, but Yaoyao is a blessing. 〕　I would like to change from Daya to Xiaoya and Yaoyao to Tianyao according to the original text.
